tasks.task: Wear protective equipment when handling pesticides
subtasks: Wear extra protection on top of regular protective equipment
Use an apron over protective clothing
Wear protective eyewear
Open pesticide containers correctly to prevent dust release
Place pesticide containers on a stable, low, flat surface
Use a sharp knife or scissors to open containers
Wash knives or scissors thoroughly after use on pesticides
Use tools only for opening pesticide containers

tasks.task: Follow label instructions for pesticide application
subtasks: Determine correct amount of pesticide needed from label
Measure pesticide accurately
Pour pesticides carefully to prevent spills or splashes
Ensure face and eyes are above the pesticide container during pouring
